logisim.changelog: * New Flip-Flops attributes and new layout (fully retro-compatible) * New TTL 7485: 4-bit magnitude comparator * New TTL 74283: 4-bit binary full adder * Solved every kind of retro-compatibility problem * Mouse wheel now will zoom where you're pointing at * Press ESC or DEL to cancel "add tool" action * Truth table is now displayed with a different color for each row * Press F5 to repaint * Fixed a bug in Digital Oscilloscope and in translations * All the menu windows now will open at the screen center * Display Decoder: multibit attribute changed into true by default * Solved empty template bug
